description:
Girl Of Now Shine EDP - A Radiant Expression of Feminine Elegance

Experience the captivating allure of Elie Saab Girl Of Now Shine, a luminous interpretation of the iconic Girl Of Now fragrance. This 90ml eau de parfum captures the essence of modern femininity with its irresistible blend of gourmand and floral notes that create a truly unforgettable scent signature. âœ¨

The Brilliant Evolution of Girl Of Now

Created in 2018 as a dazzling flanker to the original Girl Of Now, this oriental floral fragrance takes the beloved pistachio-almond accord and elevates it with sparkling pineapple and radiant ylang-ylang. The result is a more luminous, vibrant expression that maintains the distinctive DNA of the original while offering a fresh, glowing dimension. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 90ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Elie Saab

A Symphony of Captivating Notes

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Pineapple, Mandarin Orange, Black Currant
Heart Notes Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Almond, Pistachio
Base Notes Patchouli, Vanilla, Amberwood

Key Features of Girl Of Now Shine:

  • ðŸ’Ž Signature pistachio-almond accord enhanced with tropical pineapple
  • ðŸ’« Longer-lasting formulation with exceptional sillage
  • ðŸŒ¿ Distinctive bottle design with the iconic flower stopper in golden hues
  • ðŸ”¥ Perfect balance between gourmand sweetness and sophisticated florals
  • âœ¨ Ideal for best-selling evening and special occasion wear

Elie Saab, the renowned Lebanese fashion designer, launched his eponymous fragrance line in 2011, bringing his couture sensibility to the world of perfumery. The oriental fragrance collection Girl Of Now represents his vision of the modern womanâ€”confident, radiant, and unforgettable. Each bottle is adorned with the signature flower emblem, a symbol of timeless femininity and artisanal craftsmanship.

Frequently Asked Question

How does Girl Of Now Shine differ from the original Girl Of Now?

While both fragrances share the distinctive pistachio-almond heart, Girl Of Now Shine introduces a more luminous character with the addition of tropical pineapple and enhanced ylang-ylang. The pineapple note brings a juicy brightness that makes Shine more radiant and slightly sweeter than the original, while maintaining the sophisticated patchouli base. It's perfect for those who love the original but desire a more sparkling, vibrant interpretation for new arrivals to their collection.
short_description: Discover Girl Of Now Shine EDP, a dazzling oriental-floral fragrance from Elie Saab featuring a signature pistachio-almond accord enhanced with sparkling pineapple and ylang-ylang. This 90ml perfume radiates feminine confidence with its perfect balance of gourmand sweetness and sophisticated florals.
